description: Those isolating at home must stay indoors for a full 14 days except to use their own private garden.
title: Coronavirus: Returning residents 'may quarantine at home'
title_page: Coronavirus: Returning residents 'may quarantine at home' - BBC News
maintext: Anyone quarantining under the scheme will "not be allowed to go outside at all for the full 14 days" except for the use of a private garden, he added.
